attributes.action: David Milliband to return, become Labour leader, and push for a 2017 election.
attributes.background:
- fix referendum
- restore calm to the Labour
- call for vote of no confidence in Gov
- push for an election in 2017
- confirm No TTIP
- confirm UK will negotiate sensibly with EU over the issues raised by the leave campaigners (transparency with EU legislature, and controls on immigration)
